name: Healing Quest
description:
Play on browser!

Move with WASD. Select spell and target with mouse.

Toggle fullscreen with F4.

In this game you play as the healer in a party of adventurers. It's your job to keep them safe throughout their quest.

Additional credits

  • BGM by Visager (Josie Brechner)
  • Some SFX by Liu Jiajun and ViRiX Dreamcore (David Mckee)
  • Color palette by DawnBringer
